titleStmt.title: The history of our B. Lady of Loreto. Tra[n]slated out of Latyn, into English
Lauretanae historiae libri quinque. English
titleStmt.author: Torsellino, Orazio, 1545-1599.
Price, Thomas, 1570-1625.
Du Tielt, Guillaume, engraver.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted with licence [at the English College Press],

notesStmt.note: A translation of: Orazio, Torsellino. Lauretanae historiae libri quinque.
Translator's dedication signed: T.P., i.e. Thomas Price.
A reissue of STC 24140.5, with cancel engraved title page signed "Guil. du Tielt. fe". In this issue 2*8v has an engraved illustration on verso instead of being blank.
Running title reads: The history of Loreto.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

orgName.name: Basilica della Santa Casa di Loreto
